item.description: All entity working area/ staging area: å·¥ä½œåŒºå’Œæš‚å­˜åŒºï¼Œè¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰è¿™æ¬¡æ”¹åŠ¨çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆåŸºäºbranch latest commit {snapshot}ï¼‰ commit: commit æ˜¯ tree + parents + log root tree id: snapshot of file system commit info: commit messageï¼Œauthor, time parent commit id: commit list tree: snapshot of file system under the dir, blob: snapshot of file branch:a pointer to latest commit, it’s the base of working area Point all object(commit, tree, blob) éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸å¯å˜çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåªè¦å†…å®¹å˜äº†ï¼Œid shaå°±ä¼šå˜ã€‚ New learning from blog
